body.name: mislili Pillows Queen Size Set of 2, Hotel Quality Bed Pillows for Sleeping, Queen Pillows Set of 2 Support & Comfortable, Down Alternative Queen Pillows 2 Pack for Back, Stomach or Side Sleepers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 29 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🎁【Upgrade Your Bedroom】Make your bed full of fluffy comfort like that found in high-end hotels around the world. Our luxury pillows are a great way to upgrade your bedroom for a more natural, refreshing sleep.

🎁【Improve Sleep Quality】mislili queen pillow fabric is durable and firm, soft to the touch. So you can enjoy plenty of comfort for many nights to come. Mislili Microfiber bed pillow is perfect for those after a truly relaxing night's sleep.

🎁【Healthy Materials】Made with 100% ultra-plush down alternative polyester filling, mislili queen pillows set of 2 are designed to gently conform to the shape of your head and neck, giving you incredible comfort and support. Relieves migraines and neck pain.

🎁【Skin Friendly】mislili queen size pillow is non-allergenic, making it a great choice for those with delicate skin or those with asthma, while the 150 GSM brushed microfiber pillowcase adds further luxurious comfort.
🎁【Satisfaction Guarantee】We are very confident in the quality of the products we provide, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will take all responsibility.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The interior of the pillow is fluffy and supportive, allowing air to circulate naturally inside the pillow, giving you maximum relaxation and cooling while you sleep. 100% skin-friendly fabric, allowing you to sleep comfortably. Provides ultimate comfort and relieves stress, neck pain and other aches and pains. Ensures maximum comfort in any sleeping position and is suitable for all back, side and stomach sleepers. Breathable hood and cooling technology regulate temperature for cooler nights. OEKO-TEX certified：Our pillows are Standard 100 certified - meaning all materials are free of harmful substances and can be used with confidence. Made from premium down alternative for a comfortable night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are really good pillows, I have a lot of neck issues and have bought more pillows than I can count. The pillows are pretty big for a queen, but they fit in my queen pillow cases just fine. I was truly surprised on the support for my neck that I get from this pillow. I would say they are medium- soft, no issues with them going flat. I can honestly say that for the last two weeks so far I am not waking up in the middle of the night to flip my pillow and my neck is doing pretty good with the pillow. I highly recommend this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: I have bought several sets of pillows last couple years, these were better quality, comfort and size. Great to get good nights sleep no sore neck or back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice soft/sturdy pillow
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for pillow which should be soft but at the same time should not get squeeze or narrow down. this pillow works exactly i was looking for. I am getting nice sleep and it gave feeling like sleeping in high end hotels. I am happy with the product/pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set of Pillow.
reviews.reviewText: It is very comfortable and the size is also good.Its highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding pillows, Highly Recommend Them
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are so soft, comfy and fluffy. As soon as I removed them from the vacuum sealed bag they inflated to just the right size for my liking. I have since bought another set for our guest room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: these pillows are super comfortable and they stay in shape. My old pillows changed shape after a while. They provide like a medium support which is great to use as pillow for sleeping and body pillow. I bought king size and they fit into my pillow case perfectly. Great product! I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good pillows. No smell at all! They became fluffy after a while out of the bag. Now my queen bed has pillows that match its size now haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars They didn't fluff like they were suppose too
reviews.reviewText: I ordered standard and these are king size. They only fluffed up to about 4 inches. When you lay on them they flatten down. I like a firm thick pillow.
